channel.title: Setting up easy rsc on vps
channel.description: Just wondering if anyones kind enough to help my friend Run easy rsc on his vps.. Just going to be run for small group for friends to pk. If anyone can teamview it for him that would be much appreciated. THANK YOUUUUU :)

item.description:
@inspectah wrote:

Fixed… thank you

item.title: Setting up easy rsc on vps
item.dc:creator: @waj waj
item.description:
@waj wrote:

When closing easyrsc 95% of the time the java process doesn’t close, just go to task manager and end the java process from running.

That’s what causes the bind most of the time.

Read full topic
item.source: Setting up easy rsc on vps

item.title: Setting up easy rsc on vps
item.dc:creator: @Tobbo88 Tobbo88
item.description:
@Tobbo88 wrote:

Already posted for help on rune-server because i cannot pay people to do it on here.

Its a bind error

Had it few days ago on laptop if java runnin it gives me the error…

java.net.bindexeption: cannot assign requested address: bind

i closed java it worked… now im trying on a vps i got today and it wont work at all.

Read full topic
